definition: engagement/wedding contract
to marry/marriage/wedding/to take a wife
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: The papers that make it legal were signed at the time of the arrangement of the marriage.
sentences.chinese: 馬利亞和約瑟的婚書已在安排婚約時簽署。

sentences.english: I finally wormed out of her the reason she broke off her engagement to Jim.
sentences.chinese: 我終於問出她和吉姆解除婚約的原因。

sentences.english: He signed the marriage contract, he gave me permission to marry you.
sentences.chinese: 他簽了婚約，他允許我娶你。

sentences.english: Approximately 55 hours later, the marriage was annulled.
I have already put on my engagement.
sentences.chinese: 我已經戴上我的婚約了。

sentences.english: Some have even gone as far as professing their love and proposing marriage.
sentences.chinese: 有人甚至走得更遠，向他表達愛意和發出婚約。

sentences.english: The court has divorced the couple, as the man demanded.
sentences.chinese: 最終，法庭同意了他的解除婚約要求。

sentences.english: Each grass is. a child bridegroom of an ox or a sheep. They have been bonded by marriage.
sentences.chinese: 每株草都是牛羊家族的童養媳，早有婚約在的。

sentences.english: The marriage was annulled in early January.
sentences.chinese: 這份婚約在元月初宣告無效。

sentences.english: Affiance is a contract in essence.
sentences.chinese: 婚約性質從本質上說應屬一種契約。

sentences.english: It is the primary role to adjust the relationship of affiance how to confirm the time of affiance.
sentences.chinese: 婚約關係的處理首要任務乃在確定婚約成立的時間。

sentences.english: It is the primary role to adjust the relationship of affiance how to confirm the time of affiance.
sentences.chinese: 婚約關係的處理首要任務乃在確定婚約成立的時間。

sentences.english: At the same time to recall for refusing to jin wang engagement provoked anger in the king.
sentences.chinese: 同時又回想到自己因爲拒絕晉王的婚約惹得晉王大怒。

sentences.english: If not, the engagement will be cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 女孩若失去童貞，婚約就被解除。

sentences.english: The contract would stipulate reimbursements at any point the engagement is called off.
sentences.chinese: 該協議將規定在任何時間段取消婚約應支付的賠償。
